draw2d(proportional_axes=xy,
explicit( 4.100000 + -0.700000 * (x - 27.700000) + 7.768977 * ((x - 27.700000)^2) + -10.711404 * ((x-27.700000)^3),x,27.700000,28.000000), 
explicit( 4.300000 + 1.069307 * (x - 28.000000) + -1.871287 * ((x - 28.000000)^2) + 0.601980 * ((x-28.000000)^3),x,28.000000,29.000000), 
explicit( 4.100000 + -0.867327 * (x - 29.000000) + -0.065347 * ((x - 29.000000)^2) + -0.167327 * ((x-29.000000)^3),x,29.000000,30.000000)
);
